subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Daniel Paille and Patrice Bergeron scored to help Boston take a 2-1 series lead over the Blackhawks, who lost Marian Hossa when he was injured in pregame warm-ups.
snippet: Daniel Paille and Patrice Bergeron scored to help Boston take a 2-1 series lead over the Blackhawks, who lost Marian Hossa when he was injured in pregame warm-ups.
